Early this month I had the opportunity to attend the [2016 GIS for a Sustainable World Conference](http://www.gisfortheun.com/) held on May 2–4, 2016 in Campus Biotech, Geneva, Switzerland. View slides from the event via this link: <https://proceedings.esri.com/library/userconf/unic16/index.html>
